message: Hi Bob, I'm offering a fair split that slightly favors me to account for the 10% inflation I face each round. If we go to the next round, my money loses value while yours doesn't, so accepting now is beneficial for both of us.
Hi Alice, since the money's value doesn't decrease for me, I'm proposing an even split this round. It's fair and considers that your money loses value over time. Let's end this on a balanced note.
